about_desc: UFeed was born from the heart of the Arab world — not as a follower, but as a challenger to the global giants. We’re not just another tech company; we are the pulse of a region long rich in human capital, yet underserved by digital innovation. Built on over 25 years of Human Capital mastery through JOBMASTER, UFeed is the spark that turned decades of consulting wisdom into accessible, AI-powered tools — crafted by regional experts for a global stage. Our journey is fueled by a powerful purpose: to break down the barriers of traditional consulting, to democratize human capital excellence, and to empower every organization — from startups to conglomerates — with tools once reserved for the elite. This is more than a platform. It’s a movement. An open invitation to companies, visionaries, and investors to be part of a story still unfolding. We’re rewriting the rules of what HR tech can be — from Cairo to Riyadh, and soon, the world. Welcome to UFeed — where the future of Human Capital is created.
first_desc: UFeed is a next generation Human Capital (HR) technology platform that democratize access to expert knowledge and empowers organizations with data driven digital solutions for building Human Capital Modules like Job Evaluation & Grading, Employee Engagement and more in the pipeline tailored to meet the unique needs of every organization.
second_desc: UFeed is a pioneering bilingual platform (Arabic/English) that is powered by cutting edge technology and in the process of enabling machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (Al) at affordable price. We believe in empowering people and equipping them with the right tools.
third_desc: UFeed carries a meaningful essence. In arabic, it signifies the benefit and value we bring, while in english, it represents the quantity of data we feed into the system. As we accumulate more data points, our stakeholders leverage better outcomes and enhance their decision making processes.

jet_page_desc: JET is an automated job grading model that helps assess job significance consistently, ensuring equity. Job evaluation is crucial for growth, affecting compensation for companies and employees. Using

Bilingual Interface desc: UFeed JET platform features a bilingual interface in arabic and english, ensuring effective communication and user engagement.
Automated JA Data Gathering desc: JET revolutionizes data collection with its automated tool, streamlining the validation process from job holders to direct manager and finally HR.
Alert Notifications desc: JET provides alert notifications for borderline evaluations, helping to identify potential conflicts in grading related to position hierarchy, which ensures clarity and consistency in the evaluation process.
Customizable Access Features desc: JET offers customizable access rights, allowing users to manage and consolidate data across various company levels.
Consistent Evaluation Process desc: The automated tool ensures a consistent evaluation process, reducing errors and enhancing control over the process for all users, guiding them through each step easily.
Comparative Position Analysis desc: JET allows users to compare different positions across departments, companies or subsidiaries to ensure logical evaluations and consistency in data, facilitating informed decision making.
Real-Time Reporting with Salaries Bands: Real time reporting with salaries bands
Generate comprehensive grading reports instantly after evaluations, including guided salary bands (Applicable for Egypt Market).
International Grading Correlation desc: Create correlations between JET grades and global grading systems for ease of reference and use.
Intelligent Job Evaluation desc: Harness the power of AI and machine learning to conduct advanced analyses of job data points based on company size and type. This innovative capability generates trends for position levels and grades, empowering users to make data driven decisions that align with market standards and enhance job evaluation processes.
ees_page_desc: Our engagement survey platform is designed to gauge employee satisfaction and motivation effectively. It provides insights to enhance productivity and retain top talent, while also allowing for customizable questions and detailed reporting.
Enhanced Understanding of Employees desc: Gain deep insights into employee satisfaction, motivation, and engagement levels through our comprehensive surveys.
Strategic Improvement and Talent Retenti: Develop targeted strategies to boost productivity and retain top talent,track progress, and make informed, data driven decisions.
Flexible Demographic Display desc: Benefit from our platform's flexibility in displaying, demographics and comprehensive multiple choice questions, tailored to your needs.

Establish benchmark capabilities by anal: Establish benchmark capabilities by analyzing internal data-point’s year-over-year and building external benchmarks through comparisons with broader market references, which creates a comprehensive view of performance, fostering efficiency enhancements across the organization.
Track survey progress in real-time with: Track survey progress in real time with our dashboard, ensuring your surveys remain on track for success.
Tailor your analytics reports to focus o: Tailor your analytics reports to focus on the demographics and topics that matter most to your business.
Leverage AI to uncover market norms by a: Leverage AI to uncover market norms by analyzing engagement survey data, identifying the highest and lowest ranked topics, equipping users with actionable recommendations tailored to enhance engagement results, ensuring organizations remain competitive and aligned with industry benchmarks.

message_ceo: Technology enablement has become a crucial tool for organizations worldwide, boosting their growth and success. Inspired by this trend and driven by a sincere belief in equitable access, I envisioned UFeed a cutting edge corporate startup at the forefront of technology driven enablement. Our aim is to collaborate with various stakeholders to introduce a well structured, advanced, and cost efficient platform that harnesses the power of data, digitalization, AI and ML. UFeed aims to bridge the gap between premium consulting tools and knowledge accessibility within organizations, empowering individuals with the right tools at an affordable price. Our name, UFeed, carries a meaningful essence. In Arabic, it signifies the benefit and value we bring, while in English, it represents the quantity of data we feed into the system. As we accumulate more data points, our stakeholders leverage better outcomes and enhance their decision making processes. Originating from the vibrant Egyptian Arab African horizon, we aspire to expand our valuable insights to the global stage. UFeed operates as a comprehensive, cycle based platform where you feed it with information and data, and in return, it provides you with knowledge and analytics. The cycle persists by continually expanding inputs and data, leveraging technology, ML, and AI to continually improve outcomes. We understand the wealth of data available to businesses and strive to provide actionable insights that drive data driven decision making.
Thank you for being a part of our journe: Thank you for being a part of our journey.
